event.text: A brown glass bottle slowly rolls towards you from in front. It gently knocks your shoe as it reaches you, its contents sloshing. A label reading "XXXX" hangs off the bottle.

outcome.text: After popping the cork and sniffing at the liquid within, you decided drink from the bottle. It's beer. Strong enough to give you a bit of a buzz but not quite enough to inhibit your senses.

You pop the cork off the bottle and are greeted by a hopsy aroma. You drink from the seemingly safe bottle but soon enough find yourself unable to think straight. The next hour is a haze. You come to sat against a tree near the road, with only the fragments of memories of what just happened and a very sore head.
Ignoring the highly suspicious bottle, you step over it. The sight of it does bring to mind your fondness for your own homebrewed ale, however.
You choose to ignore the suspect bottle when unexpectedly, it explodes, sending you flying through the air and slamming hard against the roadside.
